name: Prism (itch) (HOU Mai)
description:
Prism

A puzzle about reflection, with 9 levels

Controls

Drag Left Mouse Button - Move
Drag Right Mouse Button - Rotate

Made in a week for Prototype Studio course at the NYU Game Center.
Prompt: -isms (Make a game for a randomly assigned -ism word, I got Prism)

Instructor: Bennett Foddy
